Articles.Content:
Does anyone else use Linux mint?

I just got it, and I feel left out...

Am I the only guy who has it?
No, Lots of people use Mint, myself included.
...Was it really that hard to write "anyone" instead of "any1"? I mean, that's the title of your thread which everyone will see, the least you can do is write it properly.
When I finish up my new PC, Mint (but probably not the Cinnamon desktop) will be my KSP platform.
i might try it out next time im in a linux mood. i hear it has more market share than ubuntu now.
I have Mint, also Peppermint, Knoppix, and a few other distros I've played with on live discs. My main boxes are Debian however. Mint is nice, XFCE is great for resurrecting old machines.
downloading xfce and kde versions, dont know when il get around to playing with them. need to see if anything on my linux box needs to be backed up first (i doubt it).

I use KDE, I find it to be have really good software options like Amarok, Gwenview, Konversation, Kate and Konsole, but if my laptop was less of a beast I would definitely go xfce over Cinnamon or Mate. It's lightweight, tried and true, and you can be flashy if you want or keep it simple.

I don't always run Linux, but when I do I run Mint. I prefer MATE over KDE or Cinnnamon.

The computer I run it on is down right now, though. Blown capacitor on the motherboard, I think.
